name: Get the Ball Rolling (itch)
description:
The game is a simple tower defense style game where the object to defend is a movable ball.

  • Move the ball towards the goal and avoid the enemies, or place towers to destroy them.
  • The enemies will not attack the player, only the ball.
  • There are 3 placeable tower types: a ballista and cannon to damage enemies, and a tower/cannon which heals the ball by firing pellets at it.
  • There is an in game menu where you can reset a level if anything goes wrong, and mute all audio.

Controls:

  • WASD moves the player character, run the character into the ball to push it.
  • Hold Left Shift while moving to move faster.
  • Use the mouse to interact with the buttons across the bottom ui bar.
  • Left click to place buildings, right click to deselect if you change your mind.
